last_episode_to_air.name: Addition by Subtraction
last_episode_to_air.overview: A couple thought their home addition would be complete by the time their baby arrived, but their kid's almost a year old and the project is still nowhere near finished. Rico steps in and takes over the task, and he uncovers more issues than expected.

name: Rico to the Rescue
overview: Rico Le√≥n steps in to help Denver homeowners salvage renovations that have gone off the rails; driven by his parents' past experience with a crooked contractor, Rico advocates for families who need an expert to fix their stressful situations.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Follow contractor Rico Leon as he resolves conflicts between emotionally and financially stressed homeowners and their builders to turn renovation and construction nightmares into dream homes.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Follow Rico Leon as he resolves conflicts between homeowners and builders.

episodes.name: Carpenter Chaos
episodes.overview: A couple's plan to build a nursery and main bedroom in their basement is now more than a year past due and the relationship with their contractor has turned nasty. After a failed mediation, Rico brings in his team to get their renovation back on track.

episodes.name: Mountain of Problems
episodes.overview: A firefighter's home rebuild began almost two years ago, but multiple work-stop orders have stalled the project well past the five-month completion date; Rico steps in and meets with the contractor; they come up with a plan to see the job through.

episodes.name: Our Contractor Is at the Neighbors
episodes.overview: A couple turns to professional help after realizing a renovation is out of their reach, but their contractor's lack of focus continues to stall their dream home plans.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A couple's A-frame cabin renovation quickly turns into a nightmare when their contractor and his family begins to squat on the property; with little money left in their budget, they're reaching out to Rico to help get their project back on track.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A couple's plan to turn their basement into a teenage-hangout for their three boys turns disastrous after they hire a high school friend who abandons the job; Rico and his team step in to help their current contractor see the project to completion.

episodes.name: Rescued Restoration
episodes.overview: After a fire destroys their home, new parents are emotionally and financially stressed as the relationship with their contractor takes a terrible turn; Rico and his team arrive to help these homeowners with a plan to deliver the right renovation.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Follow contractor Rico Leon as he resolves conflicts between emotionally and financially stressed homeowners and their builders to turn renovation and construction nightmares into dream homes.

episodes.name: From Ex to Extra
episodes.overview: A singer's plan to transform her house into a haven for music takes a turn when she breaks up with her boyfriend who was overseeing the renovation. Now with a half-finished project and little money to spare, Rico is enlisted to get her home back on track.

episodes.name: Two-Story Troubles
episodes.overview: After a contractor vanishes mid-project, a family is left with few options to finish their two-story renovation. Rico and his team step in to salvage the troubled task and bring the family's dream back to life, proving that trust can be rebuilt.

episodes.name: Our House Is Making Us Sick
episodes.overview: A family encounters health problems and discovers mold growing in their house. Now, the family is forced to move out to keep their children healthy, and with astronomical costs to get them back home, Rico must be savvier than ever.

episodes.name: Every Rose Has Its Thorn
episodes.overview: A family spent their life savings on a basement renovation, and when the contractor didn't follow through, they were left with an unfinished mess. Rico steps in to help mediate with the existing contractor and bring their basement dreams back to life.

episodes.name: Con-tractor
episodes.overview: A family of seven hired a builder to renovate their kitchen, but he went missing soon after demolition. Rico steps in and takes charge of the project, and he uncovers disturbing information and a dark past while tracking down the old contractor.

episodes.name: Ghosted by Our Contractor
episodes.overview: A family needs a basement renovation to create room for their family of seven, but it's been over a year and the contractor has made zero progress. Rico helps to mediate between the family and the project manager, and aims to remodel more of their home.

episodes.name: Not So Grand Lake
episodes.overview: A couple's dream home is abandoned by a builder and left to rot through two winters unprotected from the elements. Now, Rico and his team aim to salvage what little is usable, and there's only a short window where mountain weather conditions are workable.

episodes.name: Addition by Subtraction
episodes.overview: A couple thought their home addition would be complete by the time their baby arrived, but their kid's almost a year old and the project is still nowhere near finished. Rico steps in and takes over the task, and he uncovers more issues than expected.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Follow Rico Leon as he resolves conflicts between homeowners and builders.
